image.title: Bass Nation TV Episode #2 w/ Alan "Snoop" Evans

channel.itunes:keywords: bass guitar, inverview, gospel musicians, gospel music, daric bennett, alan evans, alan snoop evans, snoop, bass nation, bass nation tv, daricbennett.com
channel.title: Bass Nation TV Episode #2 w/ Alan "Snoop" Evans
channel.itunes:author: DaricBennett.com
channel.description: Live one on one interview with Alan 'Snoop' Evans II, a native of Detroit, MI., who has taken the gospel music industry by storm with his unique approach to playing bass. He is a live and session musician in the gospel community, as evidenced by his impressive discography and the countless live performances that mark his professional career. Check out this interview as I dive into his roots and current career in the gospel industry.
